head.raw: <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="chrome=1" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0" /> <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" /> <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="black-translucent" />

body.raw: <canvas id='gameCanvas' style="image-rendering: optimizeSpeed; -webkit-interpolation-mode: nearest-neighbor; -webkit-user-select: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0,0,0,0);">Your browser does not support HTML5 canvas.</canvas>
